attributes.action: Alter the law to make possession of an unlicensed firearm result in a mandatory 20 year jail sentence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The liberal policies currently in place do not work.  Until effective punishment exists for the possession of an unlicensed firearm, the criminal will continue to use them with impunity.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
